## FocusManager.isRegistered() method

Returns whether the specified tree has already been registered in this manager using registerTree and hasn't yet been unregistered using unregisterTree.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isRegistered(tree: IFocusableTree): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tree | [IFocusableTree](./blockly.ifocusabletree_interface.md) |  |

**Returns:**

boolean
